name: Kanban Board for Figma
description:
Stay on top of your design workflow with a Kanban board directly in Figma!


  • Create and organize tasks with a simple drag and drop. 
  • Build detailed or simple tasks from a single template. Auto-layout FTW!
  • Jot down a quick thought using sticky notes. 
  • Save recurring tasks as a template for later. 
  • Set progress and difficulty levels using variants. 
  • Add images, deadlines, multiple assignees... and so much more!


-

Jello (@madewithjello)
